Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel with incredible attention to detail We only stayed for one night and genuinely wish that we were staying for longer The spa is amazing and definitely worth a visit and the breakfast was lovely and fresh

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: WiFi was horribly slow one of the worst internet i ve ever seen Rooms are very small but nicely done
Positive_Review: Location is good walking distance from Via Montenapoleone Hotel is pretty spa is nice

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Wouldn t change a thing and will return
Positive_Review: The room was gorgeous The bathroom lovely The reception was warm and helpful We arrived late and the recommendation for a late night restaurant was truly amazing

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Staff could not have done more for us They were friendly helpful and interested in our stay Breakfast had everything you could have thought of Everything was absolutely 5 Everyday you came back to sweets in your room and a weather forecast for the next day Plus we were upgraded on arrival Could not have had a better stay in Milan

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Huge room high ceilings overlooking the courtyard in a beautiful older building The bathroom was nice luxurious with a comfortable bath and shower Staff was extremely friendly and always helpful In a great area away from all the tourist traps but surrounded by lots of restuarants cafes and shops About an 8 10 minute walk from the Metro with a tram stations just out front Complimentary water bottles everyday chocolates and chips Highly recommend and definitely worth a visit

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Very expensive drinks at the hotel but so were a lot of the bars around certain tourist attractions Best deals are in the parks for drinks and ice creams
Positive_Review: Excellent Hotel clean and beautiful decor Very helpful and polite staff Did not use the spa as too busy exploring but it looks wonderful Great location to explore the city

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Only a very small observation that there was no bath But the shower was very nice
Positive_Review: Exceptional staff Everyone was polite friendly and very helpful We were about 0 5 mile s walk from the shopping centre and 1 mile from the Duomo The breakfast was excellent with lots of choice to suit all palates As a lovely gesture they gave our daughter a little birthday cake treat We would come again

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: The room was beautifully decorated and the bed was comfortable great breakfast The sauna and pool area was very relaxing Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The price of drinks in the lobby bar I really wanted to enjoy the wonderful bar but drinks where extortionately priced even for a classy hotel such as this one I expect to pay more but not double and triple the price I would pay anywhere else
Positive_Review: Loved the room decor and the comfort of the whole place

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Only two seats at the reception area There are 2 lifts and one of them was out of order for whole duration of our stay 4 days Reception staff look like not happy to see you Poor breakfast buffet not as expected from a 5 star hotel Ceiling decoration within the room was peeled off Strange room arrangement Bathroom is separated by glass walls from the rest of the room There is a curtain for privacy but they forget to provide curtain between shower and the entrance door So if someone opens the door they are able to see inside shower There was strange sound comes periodically from AC unit Pillows are too thin even if you used two There is only one bottle of water 500 ml as complementary for two Cleaning was ok
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Location s entourage isnt the greatest works in progress and does not match the photos Closest Metro station is San Babila so expect some walking to do or ride the bus Some of the staff members are not worth being front desk assistants while others exceeded the expectations and provided great level of services Its unfortunate for a 5 stars hotel and would impact the journey of customers having a long stay What I hated the most is blocking my credit card with the full amount of money preauthorization though it was booked as prepayment only pay at thr property directly however on last day after checking out the receptionist stated that the amount needs around 2 weeks to be refunded to my credit card This is very unfortunate specially when I paid the full invoice by cash so the blocked amount should have been immediately like other Booking com hotel previously did with me OR they should have released faster than that Blocking such a huge amount on a customer s credit card for 2 weeks isnt very convenient
Positive_Review: The beds are very comfortable The rain shower is very nice with a good pressure The room size is good compared to Italy s other hotels Breakfast contains a lot of options and is very well displayed The pure honey is simply oustanding as well as the cappucino

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The room was small with limited storage space for 2 persons luggage food and drink in the hotel is very expensive and not great value much better value to be had in the surrounding cafes and restaurants which cater for every taste and price range
Positive_Review: Staff where extremely friendly and helpful very grand public areas which where spotlessly clean Our room was also very clean and tidy with air con and a very comfortable bed room was serviced every day Great access to the spa area which was complementary treatments are not complementary We didn t eat in the hotel simply because of price

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The room was on a low floor Which was disappointing The pool spa was extra 30E which was way out of our range The Australian exchange rate is very poor so that makes it doubly too expensive
Positive_Review: Beds were comfortable Nice and clean Good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Some building works adjacent to the hotel but not causing disruption or noise
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel with excellent staff Just a short walk from the city centre bars cafe s and attractions Also there is a tram stop opposite the hotel and a Metro station nearby There is actually quite a bit to see and do in Milan besides the designer fashion outlets Great food don t forget to visit Luini s famous Panzerotti shop Also if you tire of Italian food there is the Chinese quarter nearby

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: We had an excellent stay Staff was extremely friendly and helpful They even provided light snacks and water upon departure We will definitely stay there again and recommend it to everybody

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The price of the room versus the quality what you must have in a five star hotel Although our stay in Milano was nice and the staff is very friendly the room was outdated and noicy
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff good breakfast and sweet hotel

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Proper 5 star service from the staff From the moment we arrived till the moment we left they took care of everything Nothing was too much trouble They went above and beyond the call of Duty to make us as comfortable as possible Easily the best hotel experience I have ever had And the breakfast was outstanding A surprise bottle of bubbles on account of our recent engagement I can t recommend this hotel enough

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Fantastic staff and an amazing breakfast Very good location to explore Milan The bedrooms are very romantic Will definitely book this hotel again

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: I think value for money in the bar was a little bit low That s the only improvement I can come up with
Positive_Review: The most impressive with Chateau Montfort was the staff We felt so welcome and they were always helpful and positive It felt like they did their very best to make you happy and enjoy your stay Then the rooms and the breakfast was also perfect

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The decoration is sometimes quite kitsch But this is in line with the hotel s main theme
Positive_Review: The staff was extremely friendly The spa was modern You can receive a WIFI transponder for free when you visit Milan which is a nice plus The reception helped us with restaurants and reservations Great breakfast buffet

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: It would have been great to have had a place to sit in the sun A roof terrace would have been ideal
Positive_Review: The room and facilities were excellent The selection for breakfast was superb The staff very friendly

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The swiming pool is very small Missing a jacuzzi in the spa Some problems with the shower drain
Positive_Review: The hotel is well located Only 15 min walking to the centre The staff are very kind friendly and helpful Clean rooms and very quiet

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel situated not that close to a metro but there is a tram line outside the door Staff are beyond helpful We were upgraded to a stunning room with a brilliant view Would 100 stay again Felt so welcome in the hotel Thank you

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: way overpriced most expensive yet least enjoyable of all the many hotels on our trip the smallest room too old hotel inconvenient location only tram nearby no metro VERY far from train stations and airport not a lot to eat nearby that wasn t exorbitantly high or uninteresting Splurged to relax but didn t happen here either Old and foo foo hotel Not even breakfast is included Will probably never stay in a relais chateau after this experience
Positive_Review: helpful only genuinely smiling staff member the bellboy

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Staff is so annoying they treat every guest as they never stayed in hotel before They wasted a lot of time talking to us about the spa menu and mini bar also rooms are tiny there is no shower only bath and water is dripping everywhere while you shower NOT a 5 stars definitely
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: There was an immigrant and homeless centre right next door to the hotel and they were urinating against the walls drinking beers and generally it felt threatening Our air conditioning didn t work so the room was constantly hot
Positive_Review: The hotel was quirky and the staff were lovely shame about the location

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: This is not a 5 star hotel it is a very nice luxury 4 star but needs external renovation The price charged was too high considering that similar last minute prices were available at other nearby 5 star hotels that were much better in terms of facilities
Positive_Review: Cleanliness

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: The staff are super friendly and helpful We bought the bus metro tickets at the reception Very cozy hotel with classic deco Clean and comfie Bus stops very nearby

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Access to cooked breakfast apart from eggs was difficult and there was some sort of mens shelter next door which when walking past felt a little uncomfortable
Positive_Review: Staff were exceptional and the hotel so quirky and fun The spa was small but perfect

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Was just a little underwhelming for a Relais Chateau Location was also just a little bit off centre It was a 20 mins walk to the Duomo which is not too bad but I felt I was booking something closer The omelette at breakfast was very oily with sun dried tomatoes than fresh cut ones and closer to a double fried egg than an omlette
Positive_Review: The staff were terrific from the pleasant doorman to the helpful front desk team excellent bar manager The people are a credit to the hotel Room was great very comfortable and a great size Bathroom was spacious and large by European standards

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Everyone excelled to make this holiday absolutely perfect
Positive_Review: The whole experience from the staff rooms facilities and location were impeccable This experience truly was magical and am overwhelmed with how good the Chateau Monfront Hotel was The whole facility and experience is just jaw dropping An absolute must see

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Poor level of English of the staff Hard to get myself understood Poor breakfast limited choice and the fact that the staff does not speak English soft boiled eggs come as hard as rock
Positive_Review: excellent manager very helpful Staff smiling Clean facilities

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Some of the rooms are small with a view on the inside courtyard while some of the rooms on the street are quite busy Renovation work on the square in front of the hotel still not completed

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Bed isn t comfortable too stiff hurting my back Our room is in the 0 floor ground too noisy we can hear tram from ground killing our sleep quality As a 5 stars hotel I doubt

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: 2 things We give them the wifi modem 2 days sooner and leave the hotel and two days after my partenr in work leave the hotel and wanna check out and they get 100 for modem and tell they do not give the wifi modem it is like rubbery And indo not know why they do it and they can check videos of the registery desk and can see we give them the modem Thats very bad thing And other thing is that the showering room is with glass and we are colleage in one room and we do not have privacy These two is very bad But i do nit know why they still 100 of our money

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Felt very welcome and loved the small hotel feel personal Pool area was a treat at the end of a busy day Staff were extra helpful Would go to this hotel again

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Restaurant was limited and area right outside hotel unsightly with construction graffiti and homeless Didn t feel safe to leave hotel at night
Positive_Review: Lovely staff and interesting decor etc

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The urge to go for 5 star perfection has dissapeared but the price has stayed the same Breakfast is still 52 for 2 persons but if you want orange juice you have to ask every morning if it s possible to refill The staff forgets for who those 2 cappuccino are and asks everybody if they are for them even if there is a full cup in front of them on the table Not one time but every morning At our previous stay in the beginning of this year there was focus service for the same 52 So the place lost his glance for us for sure when you leave on a Sunday like we did Then the crew is not at all at his best It s a pity
Positive_Review: Still very nice rooms perfect location in the residential area of Milano within walking distance of the Duomo but something has changed with the service

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The only two things I would change are first the lack of a window we only had skylights in our room and second the street out in front of the hotel is totally torn up and is an eyesore I am sure that the hotel management is not happy about the street either
Positive_Review: Really nice hotel within walking distance to the Cathedral and fashion district Nicely equipped funky rooms we had toy soldiers on our bed posts

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: The hotel was beautiful and unique the rooms were impeccably clean and comfortable and the staff was superb I would stay here again in a heartbeat The location was walking distance to everything we wanted to see It was perfect

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The style of the hotel is in a charming mode We loved it for our personal occasion and it was great Though it is different from a trendy place

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: There is little I can say about things we disliked in fact there are simply none Maybe the only thing that might be inconvenient for some travellers might be the distance to the city centre although it is only a 10 min walk to the Dom
Positive_Review: This is truly a wonderful hotel We had a short but excellent stay in the hotel and our experience was great from our arrival till our departure Breakfast was great the staff is great the piano bar was cosy the hotel has a great fairy tale theme a great hotel for a romantic getaway We will be back

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The rooms do not have enough space to accommodate your things
Positive_Review: Good location The hotel has an excellent restaurant Free wifi and router to use in the city Rooms are clean and nice Comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Right next to the property there was a facility that people lineup for either shelter or something at sunset time It doesn t make us comfortable to walk by
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux

Positive_Review: The staff Very good courteous and helpful

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel and really friendly staff who made us feel very welcome and seemed genuinely interested in ensuring we enjoyed our stay Would always stay there again when in Milan

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Nothing Wish they were at every hotel I stay at
Positive_Review: Staff were absolutely amazing from start to finish they impressed Want to say a huge thank you They went beyond all expectation

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: We had a really nive stay great location went walking to Duomo easy access Really nice staff Very intimate cool 5 Star hotel Cleaning is impecable At first we had the impression the hotel was a litle bit far from the city center but in fact it is very close from quadrilatero the la moda and the Duomo

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: There was nothing that we disliked in any way
Positive_Review: The hotel was magnificently decorated and appointed with modern features that accentuated a classic old world hotel

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: The villa itself was stunning and attention to detail incredible everything from landscaping to living room and kitchen well kept All rooms were beautiful and the master bedroom something else We even loved the smell of the shampoo and body soap Loved that the car rental was included but mostly Dimitri the host was very friendly and provided the best service Anything we needed he did the utmost to make it happen and provided nice dining recommendations He picked up both of our parties one at the airport and one at the boat port and dropped us off at another port 45 mins away at the end of our stay refusing to accept a tip Sisi the cleaning lady servant was also fantastic doing an exceptional job with my laundry and serving breakfast every morning There was 6 of us in total and the vote was unanimous we would all stay here again Will definitely recommend to people staying in Zakynthos

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Spa little bit small but nice choice of breakfast limited but high quality Spa for kids only from 3pm to 5 pm
Positive_Review: excellent location supermarket restaurants pharmacy nearby middle of centre only 15 minutes walk nice comfortable bed stayed in fourth floor big storage facility staff excellent and clean rooms

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: I think we were given the disabled access room couldn t stand up in the shower as shower head was fixed so low
Positive_Review: Clean and comfortable good location

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Spa pool could be a little bigger
Positive_Review: The fact they took note of my fiance allergy and prepared the room And the sweeties were great in little jars everywhere

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Gorgeous oasis of calm and playful beauty I loved everything here delightful room with thoughtful and very fine attention to detail comfort delicious breakfast feast hammam spa a wonderful pampering treat Superbly courteous staff attentive and so helpful couldn t have been more so Can recommend this boutique hotel unreservedly Thank you very much for making my short stay so enjoyable

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: asking my children in the SPA to be quiet due to some adult complains we used the SPA in children time and noises should be expected my advise to not allow adult to use the SPA during children time
Positive_Review: staff very nice and freindly

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: The staff are excellent corteous and friendly Hotel is lovely and rooms spacious Beds very comfortable and the cocktail bar a great place to start the evening

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: All Staff are super helpful and friendly including the trainees They checked all the train time table for me to Lake Como and we had a wonderful time and very pleasant day trip Well done It s a very beautiful hotel in a heritage building The bar the room decoration are all very nice like a fairy tale 10 mins walk to Duomo the city center area Which I prefer to stay a bit away from the tourists crowd so the location is ideal There is a supermarket around the corner open till 9pm which is very handy Highly recommend a steakhouse near by call Muu 2 3 mins walk from the hotel It s excellent

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: The hotel is very luxurious without being snobby The staff is friendly and helpful and the room was beautiful The big bath and convenient location were a huge plus for me

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Had a problem with the aircon in the room but the staff responded immediately and upgraded us to a higher category room
Positive_Review: Nice boutique hotel in a good location Great Restaraunt food

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The sooner the City of Milan completes the road works outside the hotel the better Hotel management may well want to monitor and control the behaviour of some riffraff and taxi drivers who congregate a little too close to the main entrance
Positive_Review: We loved the themed rooms which are so well appointed The breakfast and dinner were first class I mean first class The glorious old building is superbly maintained and so well located being only 12 minutes walk along De Montfort to the Square and central shopping areas

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The hotel was a little bit far away from Santa Maria delle Grazie where The Last Supper is located
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly thoughtful and helpful they helped us secure tickets to see The Last Supper on the next day which was my birthday We also got upgraded to a Deluxe Suite for this occasion and I received a free birthday cake as well

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The fact we couldn t stay longer
Positive_Review: The entire experience was amazing The room the beds the bathroom the staff and the food They went out of their way to accommodate us on both of our overnight stays with them I highly recommend this hotel It is absolutely charming The lobby bar is so lovely Bar menu is great This is the place you want to stay if you are in Milan Don t miss out

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: We had no complaints whatsoever and the walking distance to the city centre of about 15 minutes suited us fine as there were plenty of super shops en route
Positive_Review: Reception staff were so friendly and helpful always smiling Our room was delightful and comfortable as were the lounge bar and restaurant areas Nothing to fault at all and would certainly return Nice touch with the jars of sweeties

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Not ideal for a business traveler Small desk plugs not optimized for laptop etc But definitely doable
Positive_Review: Beautiful property great staff great location

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: I stayed for the third time last stayed my AC room didn t work I called them to fix 3 times they tried but it doesn t work thank good the weather outside cool enough so I enjoyed the fresh air I hope won t happen again for my next stay good luck
Positive_Review: I fall in love with the ambient friendly staff the property and the interior also great location feel like my second home in Milan

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux

Positive_Review: nice hotel and extremely friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Great hotel with lots of character and amazing staff they were all extremely friendly and helpful and absolutely made our stay Thank you to Pablo and all the other staff

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Beautiful building in a convenient location Lovely room with individual character and attention to detail They invited me to attend a piano and arias concert under their beautiful glass dome Good restaurants near by

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Everything It was magical couldn t ask for more It is located in the center of Milan close to the main attractions quite neighborhood and is even better that it looks on the website The place is wonderful the staff are extremely polite and friendly the whole hotel is superb the rooms are cozy and very clean the facilities are perfect the room has everything you need the hotel management is professional and they care for details If anyone wants to be pampered I would recommend this place Surely will visit Milan just to enjoy staying at this hotel again Thank you

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: Friendliness and helpfulness of the management and staff Quality of the food was very high The room its facilities and accessories were great

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux

Positive_Review: The Rooms were excellent the food was too and the service was second to none One of the best hotels I have stayed in

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: This is a beautiful new hotel Great interior design The staff was very king and helped with all our requests Perfect location

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: 1 Stupid flyer for a pancake breakfast Absurd in a French Relais Chateaux in Italy Made no sense Plus the flyer is ugly and not refined 2 The wood stand with Restaurant Open handwritten at the entrance and the electric sign of the restaurant BLINKING outside totally ruined the image of a Relais Chateaux Plus it conveys the massage the idea that there is a problem with their restaurant 3 The bar of the hotel is very cold The attendant not attentive and not willing to please

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: Would have preferred a room looking onto to the street as the back rooms are dark High pitched hum in the corridor
Positive_Review: The individuality of the decor Great breakfast choices Comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: We asked for twin beds for our older children who were sharing a room When we got there the bed was a double At first they said they couldn t do anything till the next day Only when I insisted they said they could give them another room They did give us another room but they said they would make up the beds while we were out for dinner When we got back they hadn t made up the beds to twins so we asked for the bedding and our children made up the beds but in the process they noticed that the mattresses were disgusting We complained to Peter on reception who was very apologetic and offered us another room but as they were unpacked we decided to leave it as long as the mattresses were changed After all this hassle the manager knocked half of the price off for the cost for that night I did not like the idea of the bath shower in the main room
Positive_Review: Staff helpful Very helpful with some good restaurant choices Lovely decor

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Positive_Review: I like everything about this hotel the staff is wonderful and so are their recommendations You feel in a little fairytale The restaurant is great Would not stay anywhere else

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The pool wasn t very clean so I didn t use it
Positive_Review: The staff that we met the general manager and both concierges were just amazing So helpful and friendly They even recommended restaurants to go to in Lake Como where we travelling to after our stay at Chateau Monfort

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: With all the rooms themed and different to one another it s difficult to know what you ve booked A helpful service could be an individual photo of the room supplied on reservation
Positive_Review: An amazing ethereal experience of a artsy boutique hotel we were blown away by the attention to detail From entering the hotel we were wowed by the decor only to be even more exhilarated to find personalised touches in our room for our honeymoon including a welcome note and cheese platter The location for central Milan was brilliant as there were countless top rated restaurants all in walking distance Breakfast itself was an experience with the most varied and luxurious items available to eat including an impressive tray of honeycomb to compliment the fresh fruit All in an Alice In Wonderland theme Surreal PS A lovely little touch from the hotel included a beautiful goodie box which was left in our car on departure which contained treats to make our journey home smoother

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
Negative_Review: The breakfast service was a bit chaotic made difficult perhaps by the scale and shape of the dining area

Hotel_Name: Ch teau Monfort Relais Ch teaux
